channel.title: Dragon claws?
channel.description: when ever i added dragon claws to my blank server it worked but when i wield them it says non existing item in the attack style box... and also the spec does not work... please help me

item.title: Dragon claws?
item.dc:creator: @howto howto
item.description:
@howto wrote:

thanks… and i fixed everything so every1 can stop being dicks and help me… [quote=“dragonman2, post:6, topic:370143”][quote author=`Alec link=topic=466262.msg3409976#msg3409976 date=1290617812]

wenever i added d claws to my blank server it worked but wen i wield them it sais non existing item in the attack style box… and also the spec does not work… please help me (rep++ for help)

1.) Setting your title to ‘dragon claws@!@!@!@!@!@!@!@’ will not get you help any faster.
2.) I hope to god English is your second language.
3.) Seriously, if you can’t spell ‘whenever’ or ‘says’, you should get your brain checked.
4.) There are tons of copy and paste tutorials that even morons like you can understand (hopefully).
[/quote]

there IS NO NEED FOR THIS.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Dragon claws?

item.description:
@neil1111 wrote:

non existing item problem, add it to item.cfg with the correct bonuses and use tab not spaces.
